Everyone was blown away by the main building/ check out area. The movie viewing room was so cozy and comfy. Check in was quick and effecient. Our room was huge and easily accomodated 4 of us. I loved the fully stocked kicthen. I also love the bathroom sink being in its on little semi-private area. It allowed for a great 2nd changing area! The beds were incredible! I slept the best I have in a long time. The pool is great. I loved that there was the 6 inch pool for the baby and the hit tub for us and everything in between. I believe the FSK will the hotel we use for our annual Women's Weekend from now on! The only thing that could have made the stay better would be WI-FI.

Reviews.Title: “A suggestion:”
Reviews.Author: Joe S
Reviews.Content: Spent last weekend at FSK with our 2 grandchildren, as we have done the past 4 winter seasons. They really enjoy the pool, and we consider it a bargain for the price. Rooms are always very clean, BUT one complaint we have is the lighting in the rooms. The florescent light above the table is terrible. Much too dim, and very hard on the eyes. A incadescent light, brighter, and perhaps with a dimmer switch would be a major improvement. There were also numerous dead insects inside the fixture. Bathroom light is also bad, and because the noisy exhaust fan comes on with the light, is a nuisance. Should be a separate switch for each. Relatively minor complaints, however its something that could easily be remedied.

Reviews.Title: “Beds Very Uncomfortable”
Reviews.Author: Wendy V
Reviews.Content: This is a great place to stay with children. We stayed this past summer. My son loved it, especially the indoor pool. It was nice that he could pick DVDs to watch. My biggest concern is that we literally hated the beds. Very hard and I did not sleep at all the whole time we were there. I like a plush on the soft side bed. I really do want to come again this coming summer, but am very skeptical unless some comfortable beds are purchased. If we do decide to stay it will be shorter than we would like to due to the uncomfortable beds.

Reviews.Title: “Great for families & concerns for single travelers”
Reviews.Author: SBHolland
Reviews.Content: I stayed here during off season as a single female traveler. A wonderful place for families. Rooms were clean and comfortable. Convenient location with outlet mall, food, and easy access to Ocean City And Berlin. I would stay here again with family, but not alone. As a lone female security was an issue. Rooms are not in secured buildings, but open directly to the outside. During off season the front desk closes at midnight and no one is there. I had a panicky moment late one night when my room key card didn't work and I was worried no one would be at the desk to get me back in my room. During the week the place was almost empty, but on weekends it filled up with people who liked to party. Can't tell from website about security issues.

Reviews.Title: “Our home away from home!”
Reviews.Author: Julie M
Reviews.Content: My family and I LOVE this resort...and it makes me so sad to see some of the negatives posts. There are always positives and negatives with everything in life including resorts. With FSK, the positives FAR outweigh the negatives in our mind. Our two boys are 4 and 2 and they ask to go to our "vacation house" year round- we rent one of the vacation homes each year. We visit every year the week of the 4th of July- and here it is November and the boys are already asking to go back to FSK. The rooms are spacious, clean, we don't have to leave the resort if we don't want to, there are SO many family-type activities and functions, and we are close to the hustle and bustle but far enough away to focus on spending time as a family. The staff is so friendly- the lifeguards at the indoor pool are very attentive and care about their job- and all the staff are wonderful with interacting with the children whether it be at a pool, fishing pond, craft table, movie night, etc. Despite what some others are saying, the pools are a great size, the pirate ship is awesome for kids, mini golf is great, the calendar of activities for the families are awesome, the game rentals/DVD rentals are free and there is a good variety, staff, room cleanliness, etc is all fabulous. I would not change a thing about our previous stays at FSK and we plan on staying there for years to come, in our same vacation house even after our kids are grown. It is a great place to get away and enjoy spending time with one another. We appreciate everything that FSK stands for and thank you for continuously working to keep it that way.

Reviews.Title: “We wish that we would have found this place years ago~”
Reviews.Author: Joanne H
Reviews.Content: We have been coming down every summer at least 3-7 days since 1996.We had tried quite a few places.We are so sorry that we never tried this place years ago when our boys were small.The boys both caught their first fish there,swam everyday,played golf,basketball,swam inside,rode the shuttle bus a few times too.We all liked that rooms are very clean with lots of room.They treat you so nice at the front office & they're always willing to help.Great security! fitness room, game room,& washers &dryers changing rooms inside where pool is located & it's all so clean and nice. We had clean towels & the bed was made everyday with a cute animal made from towels on it. SO CLASSY,nice unexpected things.We are going to see if a lot more friends & family will come next time.We didn't want to leave & we wanted all of our family to come and spend next year there.Our boys who are 16 LOVED IT! & granddaughter who is 7& Autistic LOVED IT too! She needed some special help with some things they were very helpful with that too.

Reviews.Title: “10 YEARS AND COUNTING”
Reviews.Author: Jackie Z
Reviews.Content: My son and I have been staying at FSK for 2 wks every Aug since he was 10. He really enjoyed the outdoor pools, then came the indoor pool, game room, mini golf, & pirate pool (too old for that when it was built). We have seen many changes & improvements over the years. As a single Mom I always felt very comfortable & safe at FSK. My son is now 20 & we spent 2011 vacation at FSK. I'm very fortunate to have created many wonderful memories and plan one day to included grandchildren in the mix. See you in Aug. 2012!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “NOT HAPPY WITH SO CALLED RENOVATIONS”
Reviews.Author: GEA919
Reviews.Content: I've stayed at the Francis Scott Key Family Resort many times over the past 10+yrs. I'm usually satisfied w/my stay, but I was not happy this time. I last stayed here in 2008, before the so called renovations. We were placed in the main lodge, which does not have an elevator. My elderly relatives were forced to drag their luggage up several flights of steps by themselves. The first room they placed us in on the 2nd floor had black mold around the tub. The second room they placed us in was on the 3rd floor, and the only updates we noticed was a new paint job, comforter on beds, toilet, sink, mirror & light fixtures. Everything else about the room was outdated including the furniture.

Reviews.Title: “So bad, it made my son sick”
Reviews.Author: CoffeeBuyer
Reviews.Content: I booked the F Scott Key for my family for a week while I was in Ocean City to fish the White Marlin Open. When we checked in, I was surprised at how dirtly, musty, and old the MOTEL rooms felt. No big deal, though, it had a pool and fun stuff for the kids to do. The outdoor water park area was basically a parking lot with a mini water park on it. The 5 year old loved it, the 8 year old hated it. We then went to the indoor pool, which, despite being overcrowded, was a good time. The realy issue came at night. After being in the room for three hours, my son had an allergic reaction, followed by an asthma attack. It's happened before, so we had medicines to help him out. However, he didn't get better. The next night he got so bad that we took him to the ER. He spent the whole night and next day there being treated. I went back to the hotel to get our things and discuss this issue with the manager. Her attitude was non-sympathetic and she would not refund us our remaining three days--despite the fact that my son nearly died from the mold and dust in the room! She offered a credit for a future visit--which is an impossibility given the adverse reaction that my son had to their facilities. If you go to FDR, just know that you are going to a dirty, unkept, motel with crappy service. Then you may not be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Don't come to this hotel!”
Reviews.Author: danrodjr
Reviews.Content: We traveled a long way to get here after speaking to them on the phone and looking at the internet site. They told us on the phone that we would be able to get the internet rate when we checked in since there were problems booking our room on line. When we arrived they did not want to honor anything that we were told on the phone, and stated that we were lying about talking to someone there. We also found out that most of the things they showed on line for the kids to do were closed for the season and they did not show that on line. After speaking to them at the hotel and finding out that they were not going to honor what we were told on the phone we left and went to the Holiday Inn Suites on the boardwalk who gave us $100.00 off our room rate to keep us vacationing in Ocean City.

Reviews.Title: “Great trip for the kids!!!”
Reviews.Author: Daddyrick60
Reviews.Content: This was the first trip to the beach for my grandsons. With everything that the resort had to offer, they would have rather stayed there and not went to the beach. The boys loved the pools. Everything was very clean and the staff was great. Will make this our place to stay as well as recommend to others. Thanks for the great vacation.

Reviews.Title: “We Loved it and Definitely will stay there again!”
Reviews.Author: Kelly E
Reviews.Content: My husband and I just stayed at the Francis Scott Key this past weekend, I was so impressed with the cleaniness of the rooms, the pleasant smell of the room, and the grounds of this hotel, the comfort of the beds, and all the amentities, as well as the friendlyness of ALL the staff made our stay so enjoyable!!! I cannot believe that I didn't discover this place sooner, we have been going to OC, MD for the past 20 years and now that our son is older, I believe we would've really enjoyed this place 20 year prior. From now on...we will definitely stay a Francis Scott Key! Sincerely, Kelly E.

Reviews.Title: “Best place for kids”
Reviews.Author: TravelingGirlPa
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a place to take kids, you can't beat this place. I have a 17 month old that loves this place as much as we do. The pirate ship area is fenced in and has lots of things for the kids to do. They have tables there for you to eat at as well. I highly recommend staying in one of the rooms at the Delware building if you have small kids. Unless you like to go to bed very early, you may mind. But for us, we like going to the boardwalk after we eat, so the noise is not a problem. I didn't think it was too noisy. My son took his nap in the room with no problem at all. The a/c minimizes the noise. Yes, the rooms are not the "Hilton's", but neither is their prices. People come from all over because there is none like this place. If it rains, your lucky enough to still be entertained by the indoor pool. The bus shuttle is great. We were hesitate to take both strollers and 2 kids on it, but it worked out great. The drivers helped us put the strollers in the back without breaking them down. They hire a lot of Russians for the summer and they were very nice. If you look, you can find fault; if you strive to be happy, you will enjoy everything without noticing the faults. For those who need the net, they have 2 computers in the main building and wireless.

Reviews.Title: “Great Family Place!”
Reviews.Author: Jody R
Reviews.Content: We stayed at FSK Sept. 1 - 4 and there were six of us in an end unit with a kitchen. The room was very clean and the tempur-pedic beds were awesome! We went to the indoor pool and the outdoor pool with the bar and both were very, clean! We loved, loved, loved the shuttle bus to the boardwalk and found the bus driver Bill to be very friendly and informative!! We have stayed at FSK back in 2005 and we found the renovations to be a nice improvement! The only negative thing we encountered was the internet service was very poor, but they do have computers in the office if you really need to use one. One suggestion, it would be nice to see tennis courts added and different system for the wrist bands! We understand the reason for the wrist bands, but found them to be uncomfortable and couldn't imagine wearing them for an entire week. All in all, it's a great, clean, affordable family place and we look forward to going back!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Place to Stay -- Especially for Kids”
Reviews.Author: amboyd0407
Reviews.Content: This was our second year visiting FSK (we came for 3 days last year and decided to return for 5 days this year) with our 2 sons and their grandparents. Our kids absolutely love this place, especially the sprayground and the mini golf, and they really wanted to go back this summer. Our entire family had a fantastic time. The rooms are definitely not the fanciest and even the updated rooms do seem a bit dated, but in our experience they have ALWAYS been very clean, and having the kitchenette has been just great, saving both time and money. The shuttle bus service is also great. FSK is a great value. Our older son is severely autistic, and the FSK staff and other guests were so nice to him and to us while he was there -- that means an awful lot to families like ours, where trips can sometimes be difficult and people are not always very understanding of our son. Thank you for making our vacation so enjoyable and memorable -- we will be back!

Reviews.Title: “Great place for a family with young children”
Reviews.Author: P R
Reviews.Content: We are wrapping up our 1-week vacation, and have had a great time here. We stayed in one of the cottages. It was a bit dated, but perfectly suitable for us. The cottage included a washer/dryer, a full kitchen, 2 bedrooms, bathrooms. I was here with a 3 and 4 year old. They loved all the kid-friendly features. The splash pad was fantastic, it's a big pirate ship. While we were there, there was a staff member on duty supervising. The indoor pool provided lots of entertainment. And then there was putt putt and the playground. The shuttle is highly recommended. It comes every 15-20 minutes, drops you right off at the boardwalk. Very easy and convenient. We "borrowed" movies almost every night from the front desk, or watched one of their nightly features in the family lounge. We did not try the restaurant, as we had our own kitchen. The staff were great. Everyone was super friendly and helpful the entire week. A nice touch - the housekeeper left towel "animals" for us - including an elephant and a pair of kissing swans. All in all, this certainly wasn't the fanciest place we've ever stayed, but is definitely the friendliest, and the best kid-friendly place. We would definitely return here. Oh yeah, and they have a bar at the outdoor pool, something they don't really advertise.

Reviews.Title: “The hotels and pools were dirty.”
Reviews.Author: Biffer12
Reviews.Content: The hotel rooms were not very clean. The vacation homes were run down. The hottubs were very dirty. Infact the indoor hottub had dirt floating in it from the time we got there until we left. I will say the outdoor sprayground was nice. Though it was advertised to be open until 8pm and they closed it at 6pm. The 50's diner had the worst service and the food was awful. That was also advertised to be open until 9pm but closed at 3pm. The outdoor pool's concrete by the stairs to get into the pool was broken up and pieces of concrete were all over the pool. I would not recommend this hotel to anybody.

Reviews.Title: “Second time at the FSK”
Reviews.Author: Jason S
Reviews.Content: We just completed a weeks vacation at the Francis Scott Keys. The pirate sprayground provided my two year old twins and my 5 year old with plenty of water filled activity. They enjoyed the indoor pool area while it rained one day during our stay. The rooms were clean and comfortable but dated. (however we did not stay in one of the recently renovated rooms. So I suspect updates are coming soon) Our only issue with the resort is that we noticed lots of people using the amenities with out the proper wristbands on even though they claim to have a strict wristband policy. It left us waiting longer to use the free shuttle to the beach and larger crows at the indoor and outdoor pool areas. Otherwise we enjoyed our stay and will continue to stay at the Francis Scott Keys for years to come.

Reviews.Title: “We had a great time”
Reviews.Author: Goose2002
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a vacation on a budget. We're a family of three, with a five year old daughter. We stayed in the Florida Building, adjacent to the indoor pool, in a room with a kitchen (not a remodeled room). Although not luxury, the room was clean and comfortable. Two minor cons, it was dust on the ceiling and the carpet appeared old. We stayed from Monday to Thursday. The staff was friendly. We used the indoor and outdoor pool, played in the splash area, played basketball, miniature golf, volleyball, played on the playground, rode our bikes and the beach is about a mile away. Our daughter had so much fun she did not want to leave. FSK resort was a pleasant surprise, we will definitely vacation there again.

Reviews.Title: “Definately coming back”
Reviews.Author: buswim00
Reviews.Content: Stayed two night at the resort in late July and have to say, we were blown away. Our family of four stayed in the Flordia section of the resort. Rooms were perfect for us. Had the kitchette which came in really handy since we have two small boys who are either always hungry or thirsty. Couple of notes. Pools-there are two pools and 1 pirate play area. Be mindful of the pirate area as there is no staff supervision whatsoever so be prepared for a lot of older kids horsing around and making the little ones a little uncomfortable. The other two pools were great. Indoor pool shows nightly movies which was nice plus there are so many things going on in the indoor pool (water slide, bucket drops, kiddie areas), that there is something for everyone. Outdoor pool is nice to. Food-we ate at the diner for breakfast on both days. Very reasonable priced and not bad. You can also get it to go if you want and if your staying at the resort, you get like 10% off. Shuttle service-highly recommend the shuttle. Took it to the boardwalk and it was a smooth ride. No trying to find a parking spot at the inlet or quarters for meters. Runs in a constant loop so your never waiting more than 5-10 minutes at either the resort or downtown OC. Other items-there is other stuff such as free mini-golf, free fishing pole rentals, playground, basketball, and a lot of other amenties that I'm sure I'm forgetting. They truly have made this a family friendly resort and we are definately coming back next summer and staying a full week.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful mini-getaway!”
Reviews.Author: kimloretz
Reviews.Content: We stayed at FSK last week for three nights and LOVED it! We decided kind of last minute that we needed to get away as a family just the four of us. Something we never do! So I inquired on OCMD's facebook page about where we should stay. Several people said FSK if we have small children. Our boys are 3 and 5 and FSK was perfect for them. I'll start with negatives. The reservation process online was tricky as it said there were rooms but wouldn't let me book one. Then I called and they said they had nothing then the next day I tried online again just for kicks and it went through! So I canceled a reservation with another hotel and went with FSK based on the good reviews and recommendation. The room we had in the Carolina building definitely showed it needed updating. Cracks in the sink, some minor stains on carpet. etc. In the room the TV reception was awful but when my husband looked at the wire he was able to fix it enough so the kids could watch TV and we didn't have to be bothered with maintenance people coming in and out. For two of the mornings we had very loud neighbors. I like to think I sleep pretty sound but 3 of 4 of us were woken to a woman carrying on a very loud conversation on the steps outside of our room at 7:30 am. Again I am not one to complain but was very close to it. We are on vacation to get our rest. This was NOT fsk's fault but I guess the wall's are pretty thin and some of the clientele didn't have the same respect for others that I like to think we had for them. Now on to the good. We LOVED the shuttle service it is soooo easy. You just load your beach stuff in the back and they drop you off right before the boardwalk starts. We never waited more than 10 minutes for another shuttle. Most of the drivers are very friendly and make you feel very comfortable. One we really liked and he gave us restaurant recommendations. The kids loved the sprayground and indoor pool. I loved the beds. I also liked the option of a pool bar and the outdoor pool being open til 10. I was a little disappointed that the restaurant changed hours right before we got there I really wanted to try their shakes and burgers but I wasn't willing to trade beach time for it. We had breakfast there one day and it was OK. The donuts and table TV's were a great touch. Overall this was a great trip and I truly think we will be back. We really enjoyed ourselves!!!

Reviews.Title: “We go every year!”
Reviews.Author: Kira F
Reviews.Content: We go to the Francis Scott Key every year and genuinely look forward to it. It is a great value and our son loves the indoor pool and the pirate ship sprayground. It more than makes up for not being able to stay in an oceanfront room for us. We do acknowledge that it's an older property but the owners have definitely put a lot into renovations and amenities over the past several years and it just keeps getting better. Some of the things I've read about the rooms on reviews on here really don't matter to us because we are only in the room to sleep - and we love those tempurpedic beds! We had one maintenance issue during our stay this time and they immediately responded. Therefore, I do believe that if concerns are raised, management will take care of it immediately. I see the owner wrote in response to another review that the outdoor pool is on their 'futures list' for renovations - and we can't wait to see what that might mean!

Reviews.Title: “I reviewed this place a few years ago and gave it favorable reviews...not now”
Reviews.Author: MARKLI
Reviews.Content: The place is worn ou, not very clean,t and overpriced now for what it does offer...no more free breakfast...replaced by a mediocre road house style eating place with high prices and inconvenient hours. Air conditioning is not adequate, no electric sockets in the room and the pools and hot tubs are dirty

Reviews.Title: “Great place for affordable family fun in Ocean City”
Reviews.Author: Duckielu
Reviews.Content: We stayed at FSK in June for a quick 2 day trip with our 8 and 4 year old...we had a blast. We stayed in one of the upgraded rooms with a kitchenette and it was plenty of space for our family. The room was very clean and FSK had plenty to do to keep the kids busy. My daughter loved the indoor water play area and both kids LOVED the pirate ship play area. FSK is close to the beach/boardwalk and even provides a shuttle bus every 15 mins to and from the beach. My family will definitely stay here on our next visit to OCMD.

Reviews.Title: “Good resort for young kids, provides lots to do.”
Reviews.Author: Joeyd51
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed with a lot of what the resort brought to the table. The amenities offered provide hours of fun to a family who doesn't want to simply go to the beach and boardwalk every single day. My family absolutely loved the pirate spray ground and pools. They offered mini golf, volleyball, and a great deal of activities all designed for any age. The lounge was very nice and well kept, as were the other things offered. I can see however, why some of the reviews that sometimes questioned the cleanliness came into play. There are something's that you cannot miss on as far as sleeping arrangments go. Cleanliness of the sheets is one of them. We weren't expecting the Ritz, by any means. But, after the first night there, we took the blankets off the beds that we slept on and the set of sheets that was on one of the beds were absolutely filthy. And I don't mean crumbs or anything like that, I mean stained, discolored with big stained blotches on 30-40 % of the sheet. We called and have this quickly rectified, but still, on something like that, you cannot be wrong with cleanliness of bedsheets if you are a hotel, in my opinion. Also, be warned that if you are going here, the wireless capabilities there are inconsistent at best. A good part of the time I had trouble getting on and staying on, which I get it, you're on vacation, you shouldn't be checking email anyway! But, if you go with an idea of trudging through work emails while your kids nap, be ready to be frustrated a little. The signal strength in the room we were in was less than average. Overall, however, we were very happy with the resort. The people there were very nice and accomodating. The person who cleaned our room everyday would create a new towel animal for us to find after cleaning the room, which my kids absolutely loved. The place is literally a 5 minute drive to the beach and boardwalk area, and overall was well maintained and taken care of. As I said, if you are looking for a place for the family that doesn't want to simply go to the beach and boardwalk everyday of their trip, then this is the place for you

Reviews.Title: “Nice family place”
Reviews.Author: sharibrat
Reviews.Content: This was our third stay at FSK resort. We love the kitchenette for making lunches to take to the beach! Our room was clean and no bugs as other people mentioned. Each day our housekeeper greeted us politely and gave us anything we needed. Our first day we noticed the tub drained very slowly and there was standing water while shower. A call to the front desk and the problem was resolved that same night! Our children love the pools and the pirate splash zone. The shuttle is always timely and the drivers friendly and helpful as well. Love the adult drinks at the pool bar, especially the dirty banana! We love that we can spend our entire last day enjoying the amenities of the hotel even after checkout. Each year we shower in the pool locker rooms before leaving for the day. It is large and clean and makes for a more enjoyable (clean) ride home! My only real complaint would be hair at the pools. I think a better (daily) job of cleaning hair out of the pools and from around the indoor pool deck can be done. Also, even though this hotel has 'quiet hours', which begin at 11pm, I am amazed at the number of families that are so loud in the 10-11 hour. We have small children who were trying to fall asleep between 9-10 and families would come back to the resort screaming and running up and down the halls. Not the fault of the hotel though. Once you do fall asleep the mattresses are quite comfy! We did have breakfast at the diner one morning. We really miss the Marlin Moon Grille though.

Reviews.Title: “The kids loved it! (age 4 and 2)”
Reviews.Author: JaysTheWay
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the Delaware building on the 2nd floor. The beds were comfy, the hotel room was surprisingly clean even though you could tell it wasn't remodeled recently (i know a few of the other buildings were remodeled recently). The room had a balcony that over looked the pirate ship splash pool. We used a sound machine at night because the walls were pretty thin and we could hear the kids who had a hard time going to sleep, but that's what happens when you stay at such a kid friendly place. The grounds could use me better upkeep, and the outside pool and mini golf could use a remodel too. The shuttle was very nice and clean, and the 50's dinner was yummy and VERY kid friendly! My kids LOVED it, and because of that we liked it! We'd go again, and recommend it to our low maintenance friends.

Reviews.Title: “Really nice stay”
Reviews.Author: nyis
Reviews.Content: We stayed 2 nights at the Francis Scott Key Resort at the end of July. It really was a nice stay. My children 8 and 4 really enjoyed themselves. The pirates play area was a huge hit, they also enjoyed the outdoor pool. The slushy machine was also a big hit with the kids. Very relaxing atmosphere. The staff was really friendly and the rooms are basic and clean, and that is fine with me. There is so much to do that two nights is not enough to take advantage of all this hotel has to offer. And take the shuttle especially if you are going on a hot busy weekend, it took us 45 minutes to find a parking spot! It is right next to so many restuarants, gas stations, supermarkets and even an outlet mall, that you cannot possible do it all in two nights. It is located just minutes from the beach and it is so worth staying here with your family and its affordable. My only suggestions is the hotel needs signs to know where you can 'check in' and maybe some signs to tell you were the pools are located. And maybe some one way signs, because driving around the hotel can get very tight if two cars are driving the opposite ways (this is just a suggestion) but by no way any means to put down this wonderful family hotel. We will be back next year!!

Reviews.Title: “good family motel just 2 miles from ocean city md”
Reviews.Author: elkridgeElgin
Reviews.Content: affordable and clean and has a nice pool, just 2 miles from the beach. my family stayed here when we would go on vacation in the 1990's. its a good value.

Reviews.Title: “The Perfect Family Place to Go in Sweltering Heat!”
Reviews.Author: MsRe
Reviews.Content: We chose this place at a moment's notice and could only stay one night. Took the grandchildren before there and it's our favorite family place to go in Ocean City. They feature a Caribbean indoor pool that is great, especially if it rains and the beach is closed. Also a spray pool and outdoor pool. Staff was very friendly and helpful, especially when we needed a cot late at night. Will definitely go back again.

Reviews.Title: “Good value in Ocean City”
Reviews.Author: LI_RV-ator
Reviews.Content: My husband and I spent one night at the Francis Scott Key resort in Ocean City recently. This was our second time staying there; the first time we brought the kids and stayed in one of the back buildings, this time we were alone and stayed in the main lodge. Positives: the place is very clean inside and out, the grounds are nice and shady, the pool a nice temp and not too crowded (at least when we were there), and the service friendly and accomodating. We loved the poolside bar, which is not really promoted on the website (maybe because they bill themselves as a "family" resort), but which has good happy hour specials. Negatives: the beds are absolutely tiny (though the mattresses are great!) and the water pressure awful. Overall, if you are looking for a nice place to stay, are willing to trade off being on the boardwalk to save some money (they do have a shuttle but we didn't use it, so I can't comment on that service) and don't expect The Four Seasons for $150/night, this is a great option.

Reviews.Title: “Great for family's will be back next year”
Reviews.Author: jackiepyett
Reviews.Content: This place is amazing. There is so much for the children to do. You have the splash play area witht he pirate ship and mini slides for the little ones, there is a wonderful large pool with whirlpool, bar, snacks etc, free miniature golf, and at the back of the resort you have the indoor waterpark. Not to mention the free complimentary shuttle to the boardwalk which runs daily. All these ammenities are included with your stay. We stayed in the New Jersey rooms which have been recently updated. THE BEDS ARE AMAZING. They have all new temperpedic which guarantees a great night sleep. The resort is beautiful, the staff was very friendly. I like the no smoking policy the resort has. You can only smoke in designated smoking areas. You get more bang for your buck at this location. Fun times to be had for everyone. We will be back next year. Luv this place, more importantly my kids loved it as well.

Reviews.Title: “Will DEFINITELY come back for years to come!”
Reviews.Author: JenKidwiler
Reviews.Content: This was my first trip to your resort and everything went above and beyond my expectations. I just wish I would have stayed for longer than a weekend! There is so much for kids and adults alike to do, and having a shuttle is very convenient. The room was clean and cool when we checked in (which was wonderful considering it was over 100 degrees). It was also very nice that, for being a family resort, it was nice and quiet when you wanted to go to sleep. The diner also has good food at very reasonable prices (and very good homemade donuts!) Wonderful, wonderful place to stay if you want to avoid the hustle and bustle of the OC strip.

Reviews.Title: “has more room for improvement”
Reviews.Author: smc02
Reviews.Content: Our room is cleaner this time around, the ants are gone, but there are other bugs crawling on the ceiling. The booklet we got at checkin was most useful at smacking the flies. I think they came in during the time when the room was serviced. So on each of the 7 nights we stayed, I spent 10 minutes each night chasing them down in the room. For starter, management may want to consider installing lids on the trash bins on the porch to deter the flies. We also found french fries and tin foil food wrappings behind the dresser from the party before us.

Reviews.Title: “Great family hotel”
Reviews.Author: lovesgetaways32
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel. We stayed here last year for one night before checking into our weekly rental and did the same thing this year on Friday, July 1st. I did not have reservations ahead of time, we called them at 8:30 p.m. that night and they had two rooms left in the main lodge. Front desk staff is very friendly. The room was a little dated but it was clean and we just needed it for sleeping anyways. They have a 50's diner that we ate breakfast at. They show clips of old cartoons at your table, kids really enjoyed that. They bring fresh sugar donuts to your table for breakfast as a starter, they are really good so we ordered more. Our breakfast was big and very good. We spent the day at the resort. There is an inside pool with a small slide, volleyball, hot tub and there is an outside pool and another outside pirate ship water playground where they sell slushies. There is a nice playground and free mini golf. They have a shuttle that takes you to the beach and boardwalk that runs all day, we did not take advantage of this but we always saw a shuttle coming around so it doesn't look like you have to wait too long. It is not beachfront, but if you are looking for a nice family hotel off of the beach, this is it.

Reviews.Title: “No Bed Bugs Found...a Big Misunderstanding...”
Reviews.Author: Eshleman22
Reviews.Content: Hi Everyone, I wrote the Bed Bugs Found...We Were Lied To Review and I wanted to write a response to it. Honeslty....when we left there..that is how we felt. After a long positive discussion with the Owner Annemarie and General Manager Heather...we feel that it was all a misunderstanding. We love FSK and that is why we have been coming back for 17 years. I think that things could have been handled differently when we were down at FSK and things would not have gotten so out of proportion. Annemarie agreed and I feel that many positive ideas came out of our discussion. I called the Pest Control Company and they assured me that there were No Bed Bugs at FSK. Please stay at FSK...they are a wonderful family resort and if you do not stay here you are missing out! Thank you Annemarie for being so understanding and caring...It was a very positive conversation and I am so glad we talked!

Reviews.Title: “Not bad, but got a little weired at the end...”
Reviews.Author: alotaink
Reviews.Content: It was our first stay at this resort...my wife found it on the web and we wnted a quick get away...friday, sat, and go home sunday. I liked the location...very easy to get into and out of, and close to all we needed. I liked the room...it is interesting to read the negative posts on this web site, and see just how picky (petty) some people can be...some of the complaints were things that seemed so small to me...but I guess we all have different views...my room was clean and modern (new jersey). We had 2 flies that hung out in the room, but i just assumed I let them in by accident...and did not see there presence as a biohazard. Beds were ok...just not everyones cup of tee...TV was new...room was overall very comfortable. Liked all the pools...kids had a very good time with the Pirate pool...Diner was very good also... Here is where it gets a litle strange...Friday night was fine...actually quiet and peaceful...Sat. night was different...I saw a lot of cars comming in to the place sat. afternoon...in and out...in and out...and by the time we got back to the resort from going out to the boardwalk...the resort had taken on a different air...Alot of beer,...alot of ink...alot of piercings... alot of rowdyness...alot of people just milling about in the parking lot late at night....it was louder than the night before...all of this i would have welcomed 15 years ago before the wife and kids...but at this point in my life, it was a little too much...it almost seemed as if people had just come in of off the street for the night...and the next morning took off...on sunday morning the full parking lot was empty... I would suggest having a mandatory 2 night stay...keeps the one night stand guests out...if you have to be there for atleast 2 nights...maybe it would help... I would probably go back to this place...Notice that my complaints are about other people...not the place.

Reviews.Title: “Family Paradise!”
Reviews.Author: DianeCor
Reviews.Content: We just got back from FSK yesterday and we all miss it so much! It was me, my husband and our 3 year old son. We stayed in the Maryland building, room 772. It was a nice room. This was one of the updated rooms and though it was very clean, I dont think wood paneling is "updated" at least in 2011 and the bathroom needed some updating for sure but for a motel room, it was so clean, you barely noticed the dated style. I did pay extra for the updated room so I am curious what the other rooms looked like. The shuttle bus was terrific! We never waited more than 10 minutes and never had to wait for the next bus because it was too full. When I told people we were staying a mile away from the beach, they thought I was crazy but because of the shuttle, we felt like we were right there. The amenties are what makes this place so amazing! From the pools and mini golf to the small things like dvd rentals and towel animals on the bed, we will never stay anywhere else! My son is young but I think because he was happy for the whole trip... he will remember this for a long time. All of the staff were super friendly even if alot of them had an accent of some sort (Russian maybe?) that I had to ask "What?" a couple of times. The 50's diner was decent... nothing to write home about but fair prices and ok food. I dont mind paying a little extra for convience so it was great for breakfast or a quick dinner. Of course the touch screen tv's at each booth were a hit with my son! Out of the 4 days we spent in Ocean City, the day we spent only at FSK was our favorite.

Reviews.Title: “Great Family vacation spot”
Reviews.Author: Britheart1
Reviews.Content: We just arrived home from FSK---our stay was great!!! Staff was friendly and helpful, the room was comfortable. I especially enjoyed the Carribean Themed indoor pool---this kept our 3 year old busy, not to mention when booking ahead you never know what mother nature will bring. we are already planning our vacation for next year---FSK makes it super easy!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place”
Reviews.Author: happytimes_beach
Reviews.Content: This resort is great!!! The kids had a blast at all the different pools. They loved to play volleyball....Free ride to boardwalk. Nice room....very clean...Thank you...Stacey

Reviews.Title: “Already looking forward to next year”
Reviews.Author: SatisfiedVacati0ner
Reviews.Content: This was our second year in a row staying here and we love it. We are already looking into booking for next year. We stayed from 6/25-7/1 in the New York Buiding. Room has a small kitchenette. I wouldn't recommend trying to cook a meal in it, but for quick sandwiches, and little things, you can't beat it. Our toaster broke the first morning we were there so I called the front desk and within 10 minutes we had a new toaster delivered to the room, no questions asked. I was impressed at how quick they arrived with it. All rooms are non-smoking, but they do have smoking area's outside, on the end of the buildings. For being a family resort, where there are young children, our room was very quiet. We stayed on the upper floor of the building, so maybe this helped. We are a family of 4 and the rooms are a little snug for 4 people and their luggage, but you don't spend much time in your room when on vacation. Both beds are only Full size, and there really wouldn't be room for a queen size in the room. Beds are very comfortable and are memory foam. Internet service is provided free, but is terrible. We couldn't get on the net 2 of the days. I guess they haven't had a chance to get it up to speed yet. The old big bulky TV's were changed out to nice flat screens sometime between last season and this one. Our housekeeper Marta was fabulous and always had the room tip top and clean. Even the beach sand was always cleaned up when we would arrive back to our room in the evenings. Had a special animal made from towels on our bed each day she cleaned Shower seemed a little snug. They could put the rounded shower curtain rods in, and would make a huge difference in the shower roominess.. The shower curtains kept hitting our body while showering. I am just use to shower doors at our house. Free shuttle service is provided from the resort and drops you off 12 block from the boardwalk. Only drawback to this is that they stop running at 10pm, and should really consider extending the time until 11pm. Laundry facilities are available, and are clean. We took advantage of this a couple nights while the kids were swimming. They are located in the same building, so this is very convienent Onsite Cafe Route 50 Diner is a great value for quick meals. Our kids loved the indoor pirate pool We didn't meet a staff member who wasn't friendly or smiling. It rained one night during our stay, and they had free DVD movies that you could check out and take to your room. They also had a free movies and popcorn in the main building. We didn't take advantage of, so I don't know how good they are, but they have free onsite putt putt golf, volley ball nets, pirate ship outdoor splash area for little ones, outdoor pool, fishing pond, and picnic pavillion Outdoor car vac for only 25cents and it works great on removing the beach sand. The grounds are clean. I watched a young man 2 or 3 morning going around picking up litter. Security walks and drives the grounds very often. For the price you pay and the value that you get, I would highly recommend staying here and will be booking again soon for next year.

Reviews.Title: “We came back a 2nd time...!”
Reviews.Author: mrsqueen914
Reviews.Content: We love OC because they cater to families. FSK is a good place to stay. It has so many things for the kids to do. My kids loved the indoor pool, outdoor spray ship and the playground. The room is good - could be a little larger. Love the amenities in the room, makes it convenient for families to prepare their own meals to save money. Need to have screens in the window to keep the flies out. The gym is very dissappointing, broken and old equipment. Don't use the laundry room, go to the laundry mat around the corner near the shopping market. The shuttle bus is ok but needs to be bigger and more of them to cut the wait time for the next one. All in all, we enjoyed ourselves.

Reviews.Title: “Don't bother,they don't need your business anyway”
Reviews.Author: OCFanMaryland
Reviews.Content: We went for a one night trip to O.C. just yesterday,spent one night and now we're home. I've been wanting to try this "resort" for awhile now, but after reading some negative reviews I was hesitant to make a reservation. I showed up in person instead and asked the manager if I could see a room, and asked for the rate. The quote was higher by quite a bit than I had seen on their website just hours before arriving. When I pointed this out, I was told that there is a 10% discount online. I explained that I wanted to see the facilities before reserving since they have a negative online reputation, especially for cleanliness. If you read the other reviews here, you will see that for the negative, management will respond they handled it,but no detail. For the good reviews, she has plenty to say. Now, in my mind, this was an an opportunity for them to earn my business by saying well, please check it out, and we'll honor that price. In this economy, who would lose a customer over 10%? Well, FSK resort would!!! She gave me a key, but no offer of reducing the rate, and when we went into the room, the smell of cleaner and chemicals nearly knocked us out. This was a renovated room! We actually had to leave the door open to tolerate it. This "resort" is essentially a trailer park. There were ramshackle buildings with people standing around smoking in all the common areas, not only the "designated" ones. The indoor pool area is VERY small. The pirate slides are short,for only the youngest of children. And on top of it all, the buildings are priced higher the closer they are to these prime areas, but there is free parking at all of them, so why pay more? So, we go back and I walk in to return the key, and say that we are going to pass, and that I certainly wouldn't pay a premium to stay there because I didn't book online, when it is the same room, same day, and the reason I didn't is their bad reputation. I get a shoulder shrug and and the manager simply said "Ok". ***IF YOU ARE A FAMILY GOING TO O.C. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THE ATLANTIC HOTEL ON SOMERSET. This hotel is where we ended up staying. We walked in, no reservation, got a room that was a whole 15 steps to the boardwalk (we counted) and after telling them about FSK, they offered beat that internet rate I was denied at FSK by 20.00 to get my business!!! Not only that it was impeccably clean, with a deck overlooking the Ripleys museum. Sparkling clean pool as well. Listen, the bottom line is this - you can go to Francis Scott Key and spend more, be far from all the action, either pay to park and have to drive/take the FSK shuttle (which we saw picking up/dropping people and was so small they could only take about 8 at a time,so the waits were more an hour than 20-25 minutes) and also have a painfully small room, albeit remodeled AKA new bedspreads , OR you can stay at the Atlantic, have a clean, cheap room, and come and go as you please with their free reserved parking and simply walk out the door onto the boards. Do what we did - if they don't need your money, take it elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “Children Love It .....”
Reviews.Author: redfireflies
Reviews.Content: Another Year Vacation at the Francis Scott Key. This year we stayed in a rancher room in the front. Last time I stayed in one of these was at least 25 years ago. It was okay, was very roomy we had a sofabed. If there is one thing that I have to comment on is the bathroom room 501. Some things I can understand like the black on the grout where the water shoots out of the shower. One thing that is hard for me to overlook is the metal mirror above the sink that is all rusty and the rust stains that are running down the wall below it. If the remedy is a tissue box on the sink below the mirror fyi....you need a Bigger box. That is just so gross! Anyway maybe someone will read this and will do something about it for future guests. Tried the 50's Diner which was much, much better than last year. Pools were great as always. Putt Putt has a little wear and tear, but kids still love it. Friendly staff, housekeeper was very polite, kept our room looking tidy......bus driver, wish I would have gotten his name, had a great personality and was very helpful. Grounds were well maintained.

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay...smelly room, though”
Reviews.Author: OwlTrippin
Reviews.Content: The hotel was nice enough - the pool was AMAZING!!! Our room smelled a little musty, though. We got febreeze and sprayed the room down so all was well after that.

Reviews.Title: “Horrible experience with the reservations staff - rude and ultimately hung up on me.”
Reviews.Author: Natalie9765
Reviews.Content: I was coming in town for a lacrosse tournament and had made reservations a few months in advance. Called one week ahead to cancel because of family conflict. Was told that I had to forfieit my 175 deposit. I offered to move my reservations to another date (even in the slow times - September and October) and they would not allow me to move to another date. The staff was rude and very unaccomodating. They ultimately hung up on me. I would NEVER recommend this resort - it is not family friendly at all.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it and we'll be back!”
Reviews.Author: Bay54
Reviews.Content: We were there for your April 2011 Special Package. We enjoyed our rooms, the family environment, activities (swimming, movies, pizza, popcorn, etc.) We had 10 family rooms set in different buildings, but planned to make reservations to be in the same building next time. We are already planning another family trip there before the summer is done and will be bringing a larger number of family members. Hopefully, we will have our July 2012 Family Reunion there!!! The environment is perfect (pavillion, grill, spacious picnic area, family rooms, shuttle bus, kids pool, fishing, playground/basketball area, etc.)

Reviews.Title: “You are crazy if you dont stay here!”
Reviews.Author: Scott-fan
Reviews.Content: My husband, my son and my sons bff stayed here over Memorial Day weekend 2011 - we stayed in a recently renovated room 725 in the Maryland Building, which over looks the pool, volleyball, basketball, mini golf, and cool pool tiki bar...The room was clean and the beds were both Tempurpedics which is what we have here at home! Two nights, for 4 people on a major holiday weekend and we paid less than $225 - you just cant beat that! We were literally 3/4 a mile away from the Boardwalk, if we were in shape we couldve walked there! Last year we stayed at the Burgundy Inn in OC - YUCK - and a major ripoff. This resort totally is family oriented and very friendly - they will do anything for you to make sure you are smiling. The pools were clean and if you have young kids (i dont) they will love the splash playground with Pirate Ship - this place is right up there with Disney Resorts!! Free dvd borrowing privledges, dvd players in your room - restaurant on premises that is delish!! I was so sad to leave and I cannot wait to make another reservation to go back - this summer!!!

Reviews.Title: “Very impressed”
Reviews.Author: edl803
Reviews.Content: Prior reviews are on the money here. The hotel is not the Ritz but it is CLEAN and everyone we encountered from the folks working the front desk to housekeeping to the diner staff truly CARES about you enjoying your stay. The service here is comparable to the Ritz (& maybe better). We stayed in a renovated room in the NJ building, with a kitchenette, temperpedic mattresses, and a flat screen TV and DVD player. Rug looked brand new and other than the metal taste from the water pipes, things about the room were very good. Kids loved the amenities (indoor pool, outdoor splash area, mini golf, playground). Very close to the boards in OC. No problem driving over, and the shuttle is available as well. Plenty of good restaurants close by - no need to drive into OC. Oh, and there's a Food Lion and Superfresh close by but you won't see them from the main road...:-) Simply a wonderful time at a clean resort with A+ service. Will be back!!

Reviews.Title: “after staying here one time I know we'll be back”
Reviews.Author: juggalettejessie
Reviews.Content: everything was great, it was definitely worth the money. i was worried about it not being on the boardwalk but the friendly shuttle made it simple with a stroller and all, no worries about paying for parking.

Reviews.Title: “FSK Cares about Families!”
Reviews.Author: Dayzee504
Reviews.Content: Hi! I am a single mom with a wonderful son with Autism, we have been coming to FSK since Alex was around 5 years old, he is 17 now:) and even though I am on a fixed income we still are able to come each year, something we all look forward to. I tell everyone who asks what are we doing for the summer that we are going to Frances Scott Keys Resort! I think over 5 families have stayed with you because of our awesome experiences:) Since my son has Autism I call FSK "Alex friendly" meaning we can swim, eat, walk around and play without stares because everyone is having such a wonderful time they dont have time to stare at my son:) I love that! We look forward to coming with my extended family last June this year yeah!! Mommy here is excited too:) God Bless you and please continue the great work!

Reviews.Title: “Great Family Place”
Reviews.Author: BrianShaunsMa
Reviews.Content: We go to O.C. once a summer, usually in conjunction with the boy's lacrosse tournament weekend. Last year we stayed for the first time at FSK (along with most of our teammates) and it was perfect. We felt safe enough so that when our boys said they were going fishing (on site pond) or golfing (on site) or swimming ('Which pool are you going to?') they were there, on the campus, with their friends and having a blast. The tournament was only for the weekend, but I always say the toughest thing about O.C. is GETTING there, so we stay the week after as well. My boys (9 &13) caught a huge turtle in the pond and we all played volleyball at night. One night our entire team took to the pavillion and grills--we all made something different and shared a meal out there....it was kind of like family-reunion-meets-cookout-with-lacrosse-sticks. GREAT, GREAT family fun. The week after the tourney we took the short trip to the beach. My oldest went parasailing and at night we'd return for a relaxing hot tub or dip in the pool. Your staff is friendly and helpful and our room was cleaned nicely every day when we were out. WE WILL BE BACK!!!

Reviews.Title: “Would stay again”
Reviews.Author: labluvr45
Reviews.Content: I wanted to find a less expensive place to stay for a few days for Easter. I did not want to spend too much , but I wanted a place that was clean and had amenties for my kids ages 3 and 7. I chose this resort because of the good reviews. Everyone's experiences are different whether you stay at the luxury hotel or a mid grade motel. Don't let the bad reviews scare you away. This was a great family resort for the price. I requested a remodeled room and it was updated with a flat screen TV, and a tempurpedic matress. It looked exactly like the picture on the website. I can't say how the older rooms are, but the room I stayed in was very clean. The staff was also very friendly. I even received a call from the front desk a few hours after checking in making sure my room was satisfactory and was asked if there was anything I needed. The pots and dishes available for use were very nice and not old and worn. The pool was very crowded due to a birthday party going on, but what do you expect it is an indoor waterpark it is going to be crowded. There were some kids getting out of hand, and the lifeguard on duty did yell very loudly for them to stop. It was nice to have a part of the pool that was 2 ft deep for my 3 year old, and a deeper part for my 7 year old. My one and only complaint was the noise level of the persons staying above us. The lack of insulation must contribute to the noise. Luckily they were only ther for one night of our stay. Next time I would ask for a room in the upper level, but I will stayat this resort again.

Reviews.Title: “Don't stay here if you like a clean bathroom”
Reviews.Author: PBC001
Reviews.Content: We chose this hotel primarily because we were looking for an indoor pool and kid friendly environment. This place was NOT impressive upon driving onto the grounds. It looks like a run down old motel. The putt-putt golf is a joke. The indoor pool was about the only thing that was nice. We stayed in a room in the Pennsylvania building, which were supposed to be remodeled rooms. The bathroom was HORRIBLE! The toilet was filthy and actually was not scrubbed by the cleaning service until the second day of our stay. The toilet was supported by a piece of rotting wood. The water in the shower had an awful smell, the floors were filthy as well. I was not expecting Ritz Carlton standards, but a clean restroom is not much to ask for. I have learned my lesson. If the cost of the room seems too good to be true, it might be for a good reason. This place if far from a resort. I would NOT stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Not what we expected”
Reviews.Author: tyler91999
Reviews.Content: Read many reviews on here and thought it sounded nice. Wrong. First I will list the pros: 1. Decent location. within 1 mile of boardwalk 2. Route 50 Diner was good. Really enjoyed the burger. 3. Free mini golf although I assure you is nothing special. 4. Free internet. Even have 2 computers for you to use. 5. Free DVD's to watch. Now the Cons: 1. When you arrive they make you sign a form stating no refunds under any circumstances. They do this for a reason as you will more then likely want one. 2. My wife and daughter ( only 7) were at the playground when another tenanat pulled up beside the park, got out of his truck and began urinating beside his truck in the parking lot. This was on the side where kids were playing and in view of my wife and daughter. Reported it to staff. They confronted the man, he admitted it and they said " we will make a note of this in his file". WHAT. No call to the police as it is a crime, no telling the man to leave the property. no nothing. we were appaled especially as we were told they could make you leave at anytime no questions asked. but a gut pisses in front of my wife and children and he gets his hand slapped. 3. The indoor pool. Umm was gross. Found muliple piles of hair on the outside and piles of hair floating in the pool. 4. The room. Bathroom was very very small. No sink in bathroom. And we found a few ants in the room. No sense advising staff as I am sure the ants would have only got a warning. 5. Is it not strange upon check out the staff does not even ask how your stay was? I think they already know it was not good. 6. You get what you pay for as far as the quality of other tenants. Poor manners does not do just to the way other people and there children behave. We did get to witness a argument / fight at the pool as one womans kid kept dunking other kids and holding them under the water and even kicked another kid. One boy sruggled for air. Did he get asked to leave by the lifeguards NO. Summing up. I would never stay at this place again nor tell anyone to. I have submitted my review and will do my best to spread my experience to everyone I can through review sites and facebook as well as word of mouth. Now I am sure someone who is the owner will reply they are sorry and they try so hard. But really I dont think they do. Remember NO refunds so they got your money and could care less what you think or how bad your experience was.

Reviews.Title: “Just not for us”
Reviews.Author: JaysonsMommy
Reviews.Content: Just returned from our 2nd attempt at staying at the FSK resort this weekend (1st attempt was October of last year). I wish I could say with confidence that we would be going back but that is just not the case. Like so many others, we chose this hotel for the indoor pool (we have a 5 year old). Last year the pool was so cold we had no choice but to leave, disappointing our little guy. We figured we would try again because the staff was so friendly the 1st time and the rooms were very clean. This time while the water was much warmer, the chaos when we walked in was overwhelming. The slide was very cute, but we saw SEVERAL children going down head first, sideways, etc. and actually bumping into other patrons. (Maybe a lifeguard stationed for just the slide area?)We stayed a grand total of 20 minutes and left. The pool was so crowded you could not move. Kids everywhere and majority were not looking out for the little ones. Our room was nice, and the beds were comfy, but the lack of insulation separating the rooms was disappointing. Neither of us got any sleep due to being able to hear our neighbor's tv/talking and kids running back and forth from room to room. It was off season when we stayed last time thus no one in the room next to us. My fiancee' was asked at check-out why we didn't call the front desk, but honestly there's nothing that can be done when the people were in their own room and the running stopped at the "family wind down time" of 11pm. While this is a nice little place geared towards families, I'm not sure if it would be best for a family with a young child. I'm sure many have stayed before us, and will continue to do so, but it's just not for us.

Reviews.Title: “Not Impressed”
Reviews.Author: AndrewKir
Reviews.Content: My girlfriend and I received a free gift certificate to stay at this hotel. The room looked outdated, but did come with some necessary appliances such as an oven, microwave, and full sized fridge. However, we got a room next to some pretty noisy neighbors on all sides. And the thin walls didn't help much since we could hear just about everything going on in the rooms next to ours. It got so bad that we requested a room change. The customer service rep couldn't open the doors to the new rooms that they were showing us. It took us several minutes and going back and forth a couple times for them to finally get us into a room. However, it lacked the microwave that we had in the other room. So we couldn't even heat up the food that we had brought back from eating out. Plus the room was old and smelled moldy. I didn't realize how moldy it was until I smelled my clothes when we got back home. But there was a thunderstorm coming so we decided to take what they gave us. However, we seriously considered leaving to go back home a few times. We had visited the indoor pool when we first got there and it was very crowded in the pool which was not what I was expecting. Plus the chlorine was very strong when we first walk into the pool area. The kids were splashing around so bad that we decided to go into the hot tub which I wasn't impressed by. The hot tub had a lot of soap suds building up in it which is not something I have seen in hot tubs that I have been in. I have a 5 year old daughter and I would not take her to this resort. I would prefer to pay extra to take her to a better quality resort. Positives: -The main rooms come with necessary appliances such as a microwave, oven, and full size fridge -Location is good and close restaurants and convenient stores Negatives: -The room we stayed in smelled like mold -Thin walls and you can hear people next to you -Rooms look very old and have poor quality Improvements: -remodel the rooms to look nicer and newer -add appliances such as microwaves to the rooms that lack them

Reviews.Title: “Great Place for kids”
Reviews.Author: poca1313
Reviews.Content: We stayed during the weekend of the St Pattys day parade. Its a great place to stay during the offseason because of the indoor pool. A couple small things I could complain about which would be typical of any motel but the most important thing was the kids had a blast. The kids absolutely loved the caribean key pool. Its in a great location next to a Royal Farms, 2 grocery stores and a bunch of outlet shoppping across the street. We got a packaged deal that came with a panera bread giftcard and two free passes to Ripleys Believe it or not which was alot of fun too. Rooms were very clean and the temperpedic mattresses were very comfy. Our room said it wasn't remodeled but it was in much better shape then some of the same priced motels in OC. It definitely was not the taj mahal but its a place where your kids are guaranteed to have a great time. We will definitely be going back, hopefully this summer.

Reviews.Title: “Great value and fabulous entertainment for the kids!”
Reviews.Author: ocenview47
Reviews.Content: Stayed Friday night and Saturday night this past weekend. Room smelled musty but was clean. We just left the bathroom fan on to ventilate the room. Pool was awesome for the kids! Chaise lounges were not clean, needed a bath with chlorox cleanup to make them a bit more appealing. Ladies room floor in pool house gets very very wet in the bathroom stalls. Need some of the blue mat in there like is in the hallway to get to the bathroom. But overall the pool and attendants there were great. Loved that they provided towels. The miniature golf was very fun and the playground was great also. We dined at Waterman's Restaurant on fresh steamed crabs and also at Harrison's Harbor Watch at the boardwalk. Both were excellent. I thought the no smoking policy was great at the hotel but there were many butts outside our hotel room. the driveup parking was fabulous and we drove to the pool so our little ones would not freeze on the walk back (cause you know they were wet). We would highly recommend this hotel to families solely because of the pool, golf, playground and close proximity to boardwalk and fun seafood restaurants. In fact, we are going to purchase a gift certificate for other members of the family to bring their kids for the weekend!

Reviews.Title: “Great value, excellent check in staff”
Reviews.Author: Hooperms1976
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here 14 years ago, the room we had this weekend is the same now as it was then, (needs some updating)other then that we are having a ball, my only complaint is I had to leave the pool due to chlorine odor, I think they have either too much or need better ventilation. Will return and recommended to others! As we are locals now :)

Reviews.Title: “Great Family Place”
Reviews.Author: NesEva
Reviews.Content: We have been staying at FSK for a few years now and absolutely love it. I have a young son that looks forward to all the fabulous amenities; pirate ship spray ground, indoor pool, peg leg putt putt and everything else every year! The recent addition of the Route 50 diner was a great idea and they have amazing food. Everyone at FSK are nice and helpful for the most part. My only complaint in the years of staying with last year we had a tub that got clogged and even after asking for it to be looked at, it never was. However, everything else makes up for that. Will be staying there again for years to come and have recommended it to all my friends (many of which have ended up trying FSK and loving it).

Reviews.Title: “FSK is focused on the family - Fantastic Family Fun!!”
Reviews.Author: NobleClan
Reviews.Content: My family had an awesome time. FSK is truly focused on family values. We can't wait to come back!

Reviews.Title: “great family fun!”
Reviews.Author: Party0f7
Reviews.Content: My husband, myself, and our 5 children (ages 16,11,6,3,>1) stayed here overnight for our family vacation.. we were sad to leave! I honestly dont think i will stay at another hotel in OCMD again! There are soo many things for children to do. My younger daughters really enjoyed the sprayground, i couldnt get them to leave! And our older two children really enjoyed the indoor pool, put put, and arcade. I cant wait until this year to go back and stay longer! The only disadvantage is we requested a ground floor room because of the baby and all the things we needed to tote, and we didnt get it, and we also requested early check in, we didnt get that either. We did have to wait an hour after check in to get into our room. The hotel resturant food is superb. But for a family who thrives off different foods, its mainly a burger resturant. Ive already reccomended this hotel to numerous friends and one has already booked.

Reviews.Title: “Great value, nice amenities”
Reviews.Author: b4bunch
Reviews.Content: FSK was recommended to my family by a friend who had vacationed there numerous times. We stayed for the 1st time on New Years Eve 2010--just one night-- and were drawn by the Caribbean indoor pool. The woman at check-in was friendly, and helpful in guiding us to local restaurants. Our room was in the Florida building, cozy and dated in decor but clean and well-equipped. The mattress was a new Tempure-pedic. We stayed only one night & didn't use the kitchenette, but it appeared to be well stocked with cookware, utensils and full-size fridge and small dining table/area. The indoor pool was located next to the Florida building with a short walk outside and had an arcade & vending machines. The pool was very busy but had plenty of lounge chairs and tables and the kids had a blast! The water was clean and the air was actually breathable (as opposed to some other indoor pools where the chlorine burns you eyes) and was lifeguard-staffed our entire visit. There was a hot-tub, small water slide, volleyball net and other water attractions and the pool decor was very welcoming. The only minor complaints during our visit would be: alot of light comes thru the blinds at night, the room was very warm (the heat worked too well & we just couldn't get the temp down enough to be comfortable) and it was noisy--FSK has "quiet time" posted in the rule book but being New Years Eve, I don't think it was enforced. We would definitely stay here again & recommend; the property appeared well-maintained, had outside pool and sprayground, a picnic pavilion, a restaurant on-site & whole bunch of other amenities we weren't able to use because of being off-season. It seems very family-friendly and there are a variety of places to eat & shop in close driving distance. The drawback is that FSK is located about a mile from the boardwalk/beach but that could also be an advantage depending how you look at it.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, clean and pretty much family oriented; with hourly shuttle to beach in the summer.”
Reviews.Author: RetiredSteve
Reviews.Content: We must love it or we wouldn't have been back 14 times in 11 years. We've been there in February, September and even October when they have the auto show at the Convnetion Center. But I don't recommend that with young childen because you can't get anywhere near the Boardwalk. Kitchenettes are a great way to save a little money by preparing your own meals. Food Lion is only a few blocks away. Plenty of fast food and restaurants if you like eating out. But the FSK itself, has kiddie pool, indoor and outdoor pool, volleyball court, basketball hoops, put put mini golf, and the shuttle is a God send. It runs at least every hour to and from the Boardwalk. Saving you headahes and gas. Not to mention parking fees. It's close to shopping;{ across route 50}, and the marina is not far away either. Great place for a family get-away and after so many stays, and we're going back again.We even travel to the NASA flight center in Wallops Island, VA. and on down to Chincotegue to have lunch at Mr. Baldy's. Oh, and Assateague Island where the wild horses are is just south on route 611. That is something to see.

Reviews.Title: “Aaaaahhhhh....comfortable bed”
Reviews.Author: sueleep
Reviews.Content: clean, very nicely appointed. The beds were SUPER comfortable...I usually toss and turn all night when staying in hotels. I actually was startled when I awoke for a moment as I thought I was in my bed. Food was good and reasonably priced also!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome place for your family!”
Reviews.Author: nic1004
Reviews.Content: We have been going to the fsk for about five years. We have a 5 and a 7 year old who love this place. They enjoy all the fun activities that are offered such as the golf, indoor and outdoor pool. The rooms have always been clean. The kids also enjoyed guessing what fun animal the housekeeping staff would make for them out of the towels in the room. It is exciting to be building a tradition with our kids. It is not long after we leave that they are asking when are we going back! I have referred many friends to this place. It is economical but I don't think that the price affects the great quality you receive at this place. It is only october and the vacationis already booked for next year. We wouldn't go anyplace else. Keep up the good work!

Reviews.Title: “Pool is great, room is dirty.”
Reviews.Author: Foofie357
Reviews.Content: When we got into our room, it smelled musty. We quickly went out and came back to the indoor pool. The pool is great! After the pool we went back to the room to bathe the kids and when I turned on the water, there were black specks everywhere. In the bathtub and sink. We were moved to a new room at 10:30 at night which is really inconvenient when you have a six, three and 17month old. The new room did smell better, but was still dirty. The was dust and dirt on the baseboards, lamps, headboards, top of the toilet, and on the lightswitch plates. When I went to make coffee in the morning, there was an old used filter from a past guest. The beds are very comfortable(renovated room). The pool is great! Unfortunately, I am not sure I would stay here again due the issues. It's a shame because the kids really liked the pool.

Reviews.Title: “Francis Scott Key--good value for families!”
Reviews.Author: sVT_traveler
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the FSK in Ocean City for 2 days, and were overall very pleased with all they had to offer for kids. The biggest perk of course was the awesome indoor pool! The pool was clean and it was a lot of fun for our daughter, with a big waterslide, a huge snake to sit on, a kiddie pool section with a whale with a spout that spouted water...so cute. They offered plenty of beach chairs, towels, and life jackets for kids all at no extra charge. Other great no charge perks were free DVD and game rentals for your room, an outdoor pool and mini golf course and a pirate "splash" playground (we weren't able to use these because of the rainy weather). There is a 50's style diner that is open during high season which wasn't open when we were there. Also, during high season there are shuttles to the beach. Overall we had a very pleasant stay. A couple of drawbacks were the room: we paid extra to be assigned to a "newly renovated" room but upon entering it was very difficult to see what was renovated? The room was very clean but there was a rusty cord in the shower and around the tub and it just seemed a bit outdated to be renovated. The bathroom tile was cracked and the ceiling fan had no cover. The TV was an old style tube TV and was pretty small for the very few times we turned it on. Watching a widescreen movie was easier on a laptop at that point. The room also had a musty smell which might be attributed to the carpeting and people coming from the beach and pool. I can understand placing carpet for safety reasons so kids don't slip and fall but I might suggest something being placed in the room (like carbon odor neutralizers) to help mask the odor--the odor was NOT unbearable but it was noticeable. The memory foam mattresses were very comfy! One other suggestion we have for parents is to hold on to your pool bracelets for dear life! Upon check in the girl at reception gave us the bracelets for admission to the pool (no extra charge but they check that you have them so you can go in), and said it was "no big deal if we lose them, we can just let them know and they'll replace them". So we failed to read in the fine print that they gave us that if a bracelet was stolen or missing it would be 10 dollars to replace them. We cut our bracelets off and left them in the room and housekeeping must've thought they were trash. When we went up to reception to get a replacement we were surprised to find out we needed to pay 10$ for new bracelets. So please read the fine print! We wish that had been explained to us better. All in all, we'd stay at the FSK again with kids, it's a good value and a great location.

Reviews.Title: “The only place i will ever stay when going to ocean city”
Reviews.Author: ang413777
Reviews.Content: My family and I made reservations at the last minute to stay here, and I am so glad that we did. This place has it all ! Perfect for children! We had children ages 1-6, and they loved everything here. The staff couldn't be any nicer ! They are truly there to make sure you have an enjoyable stay. The few things that I think FSK should work on is, the arcade room, It was like 100 degrees with the heat blasting?, and the diner , the young wait staff are not very attentive. The food was okay, a little pricey for a diner, but the service was not good at all. The only good waitress out of the three times that we went was Amber, she was absolutely awesome!!! Overall, FSK is awesome for family trips!! I will continue to stay.

Reviews.Title: “great for kids”
Reviews.Author: newbaby08
Reviews.Content: This hotel was def one for the kids Have been going to ocean city for years and this was our first of many stays here. My kids enjoyed everything they have to offer. My son made friends at each of the pool areas. I felt very safe there. My hat goes out to the housekeeping dept. My son left behind his brand new sneakers that we bought for his first start at school and was i upset. The housekeeping dept found them and shipped them back to us. We are hoping that next year we can stay there again however we wil be going directly through the owner as we have some scheduling conflicts. over all wonderful time.

Reviews.Title: “second time around”
Reviews.Author: traker1997
Reviews.Content: oh well people have there own say this was second time there even had my brother stay the week with his family my kids and his had a ball you make due and as long as ur kids enjoy it that what matters too me you have too take the good with the bad and my stay for the weeks was all good and planning on going back in 2011 with more family members most people that due the complainning are people that dont like getting there nails dirty ok stay somewheres else but most places dont have all what fsk has too offer for the price

Reviews.Title: “Value, great atmosphere.”
Reviews.Author: elinemarie
Reviews.Content: We had a great first time stay at the FSK and will be returning next year and this is why: CLEANLINESS - It's not a new hotel but our room was really clean and in good working order.
